reference: Because an ability measure is included in this data set, it can be used as another illustration of including proxy variables in regression models. See Chapter 9. Also, one can try the IV procedure with the ability measure included as an exogenous explanatory variable.
description:
Description
Wooldridge Source: J.J. Heckman, J.L. Tobias, and E. Vytlacil (2003), âSimple Estimators for Treatment Parameters in a Latent-Variable Framework,â Review of Economics and Statistics 85, 748-755. Professor Tobias kindly provided the data, which were obtained from the 1991 National Longitudinal Survey of Youth. All people in the sample are males age 26 to 34. For confidentiality reasons, I have included only a subset of the variables used by the authors. Data loads lazily.
title: htv
format: A data.frame with 1230 observations on 23 variables:
